name: HeartWorkZ
description: HeartWorkz was a small project I worked on to incorporate the elements of Narrative Design, Sound Design and the use of Dialog.  As the project was limited in time the story direction was quite linear.  However, with more time the project can easily allow for multiple paths and a more choose-your-own-adventure style of play where the decisions you make affect the story and world you navigate.  Had a lot of fun building this one.  All artwork was created using MidJourneyAi.  Appreciate you taking the time to check it out and look forward to any feedback to improve in the future.
